ad_group.name.description: The name of the ad group.

click_view.gclid.description: The Google Click Identifier for tracking purposes.

click_view.ad_group_ad.description: Details of the ad in the ad group that was clicked.

click_view.keyword.description: The keyword that triggered the ad click.

click_view.keyword_info.match_type.description: The match type of the keyword triggering the ad click.

click_view.keyword_info.text.description: The text of the keyword that triggered the ad click.

campaign.id.description: The unique identifier for the campaign.

ad_group.id.description: The unique identifier for the ad group.

segments.date.description: The date when the click occurred.

customer.id.description: The unique identifier for the customer account.

segments.ad_network_type.description: Type of ad network where the click originated.

campaign.network_settings.target_content.description: Boolean indicating if the campaign is targeting the content network.

campaign.network_settings.target_google_.description: Boolean indicating if the campaign is targeting Google search.

campaign.network_settings.target_partner.description: Boolean indicating if the campaign is targeting partner search network.

campaign.network_settings.target_search_.description: Boolean indicating if the campaign is targeting search network.
